metadata.description: Campaign Mode plugin and Six Animals prerequisite for quest-based AI-assisted work.

plugins.name: six-animals
plugins.description: Six psychologically-grounded team role agents (Bear, Cat, Owl, Puppy, Rabbit, Wolf) plus Simon as educator/supervisor. Prerequisite for the full Campaign Mode experience.

plugins.name: campaign-mode
plugins.description: Quest-based extension for AI-assisted work. Three NPC agents (Gandalf, Dragon, Guardian) provide mentorship, adversarial testing, and quality gates for structured campaigns.
